description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
the location experimenter looked at - window/ window-control/ under/ under-control/ under-left/ under-left-control/ door/ door-control

whether the participant visited the target location – success (the value during the experimental condition is greater than that in the control condition)/ no-success (the value in the control condition is greater) / empty values (the value in both conditions is the same)
the time in seconds the participant spent at the target location
